com.oracle.truffle.api.frame

Class FrameDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.truffle.api.frame.FrameDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public final class FrameDescriptor
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Descriptor of the slots of frame objects. Multiple frame instances are associated with one such descriptor. The FrameDescriptor is thread-safe.
    Since:
    0.8 or earlier

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FrameDescriptor()
      Constructs empty descriptor.
      FrameDescriptor(Object defaultValue)
      Constructs new descriptor with specified FrameDescriptor.getDefaultValue().

    • Constructor Detail

      • FrameDescriptor

        public FrameDescriptor()
        Constructs empty descriptor. The FrameDescriptor.getDefaultValue() is null.
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • FrameDescriptor

        public FrameDescriptor(Object defaultValue)
        Constructs new descriptor with specified FrameDescriptor.getDefaultValue().
        Parameters:
        defaultValue - to be returned from FrameDescriptor.getDefaultValue()
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

    • Method Detail

      • addFrameSlot

        public FrameSlot addFrameSlot(Object identifier)
        Adds frame slot. Delegates to addFrameSlot (identifier, null, FrameSlotKind.Illegal). This is a slow operation that switches to interpreter mode. Note that even if it is checked that the FrameDescriptor does not have the slot for a given identifier before adding the slot for the given identifier it can still fail with an IllegalArgumentException since the FrameDescriptor can be modified concurrently. In such case consider using FrameDescriptor.findOrAddFrameSlot(Object) instead.
        Parameters:
        identifier - key for the slot - must not be null and needs proper Object.equals(java.lang.Object) and Object.hashCode() implementations
        Returns:
        the newly created slot
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a frame slot with the same identifier exists
        NullPointerException - if identifier is null
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • addFrameSlot

        public FrameSlot addFrameSlot(Object identifier,
                              FrameSlotKind kind)
        Adds frame slot. Delegates to addFrameSlot (identifier, null, kind). This is a slow operation that switches to interpreter mode. Note that even if it is checked that the FrameDescriptor does not have the slot for a given identifier before adding the slot for the given identifier it can still fail with an IllegalArgumentException since the FrameDescriptor can be modified concurrently. In such case consider using FrameDescriptor.findOrAddFrameSlot(Object, FrameSlotKind) instead.
        Parameters:
        identifier - key for the slot - must not be null and needs proper Object.equals(java.lang.Object) and Object.hashCode() implementations
        kind - the kind of the new slot
        Returns:
        the newly created slot
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a frame slot with the same identifier exists
        NullPointerException - if identifier or kind is null
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • addFrameSlot

        public FrameSlot addFrameSlot(Object identifier,
                              Object info,
                              FrameSlotKind kind)
        Adds new frame slot to FrameDescriptor.getSlots() list. This is a slow operation that switches to interpreter mode. Note that even if it is checked that the FrameDescriptor does not have the slot for a given identifier before adding the slot for the given identifier it can still fail with an IllegalArgumentException since the FrameDescriptor can be modified concurrently. In such case consider using FrameDescriptor.findOrAddFrameSlot(Object, Object, FrameSlotKind) instead.
        Parameters:
        identifier - key for the slot - must not be null and needs proper Object.equals(java.lang.Object) and Object.hashCode() implementations
        info - additional information for the slot, may be null
        kind - the kind of the new slot
        Returns:
        the newly created slot
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a frame slot with the same identifier exists
        NullPointerException - if identifier or kind is null
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • findFrameSlot

        public FrameSlot findFrameSlot(Object identifier)
        Finds an existing slot. This is a slow operation.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the key of the slot to search for
        Returns:
        the slot or null
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • findOrAddFrameSlot

        public FrameSlot findOrAddFrameSlot(Object identifier)
        Finds an existing slot or creates new one. This is a slow operation.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the key of the slot to search for
        Returns:
        the found or newly created slot
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if identifier is null
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • findOrAddFrameSlot

        public FrameSlot findOrAddFrameSlot(Object identifier,
                                    FrameSlotKind kind)
        Finds an existing slot or creates new one. This is a slow operation.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the key of the slot to search for
        kind - the kind for the newly created slot
        Returns:
        the found or newly created slot
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if identifier or kind is null
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • findOrAddFrameSlot

        public FrameSlot findOrAddFrameSlot(Object identifier,
                                    Object info,
                                    FrameSlotKind kind)
        Finds an existing slot or creates new one. This is a slow operation.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the key of the slot to search for
        info - info for the newly created slot
        kind - the kind for the newly created slot
        Returns:
        the found or newly created slot
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if identifier or kind is null
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • removeFrameSlot

        public void removeFrameSlot(Object identifier)
        Removes a slot. If the identifier is found, its slot is removed from this descriptor. This is a slow operation.
        Parameters:
        identifier - identifies the slot to remove
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no such frame slot exists
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • getFrameSlotKind

        public FrameSlotKind getFrameSlotKind(FrameSlot frameSlot)
        Kind of the provided slot. Specified either at creation time or updated via FrameDescriptor.setFrameSlotKind(FrameSlot, FrameSlotKind) method.
        Parameters:
        frameSlot - the slot
        Returns:
        current kind of this slot
        Since:
        19.0

      • setFrameSlotKind

        public void setFrameSlotKind(FrameSlot frameSlot,
                             FrameSlotKind kind)
        Changes the kind of the provided slot. Change of the slot kind is done on slow path and invalidates assumptions about version of this descriptor.
        Parameters:
        frameSlot - the slot
        kind - new kind of the slot
        Since:
        19.0

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of an array which is needed for storing all the frame slots. (The number may be bigger than the number of slots, if some slots are removed.)
        Returns:
        the size of the frame
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • getSlots

        public List<? extends FrameSlot> getSlots()
        Retrieve the current list of slots in the descriptor. Further changes are not reflected in the returned collection.
        Returns:
        the unmodifiable snapshot list of FrameSlot
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • getIdentifiers

        public Set<Object> getIdentifiers()
        Retrieve the current set of all the identifiers associated with this frame descriptor. Further changes are not reflected in the returned collection.
        Returns:
        the unmodifiable snapshot set of all the identifiers in this frame descriptor
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • copy

        public FrameDescriptor copy()
        Deeper copy of the descriptor. Copies all slots in the descriptor, but only their identifier and info but not their kind!
        Returns:
        new instance of a descriptor with copies of values from this one
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • getVersion

        public Assumption getVersion()
        Returns an assumption reflecting the frame's current version, which is updated every time a slot is added or removed, or an existing slot's kind is changed. This assumption is associated with compiled code that depends on the internal frame layout.
        Returns:
        an assumption invalidated when a slot is added or removed, or a slot kind changed.
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • getDefaultValue

        public Object getDefaultValue()
        Default value for the created slots.
        Returns:
        value provided to FrameDescriptor.FrameDescriptor(java.lang.Object)
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • getNotInFrameAssumption

        public Assumption getNotInFrameAssumption(Object identifier)
        Make an assumption that no slot with the specified identifier is present in this frame descriptor. Invalidated when a frame slot with the identifier is added.
        Parameters:
        identifier - frame slot identifier
        Returns:
        an assumption that this frame descriptor does not contain a slot with the identifier
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the frame descriptor contains a slot with the identifier
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Since:
        0.8 or earlier
